name: bboolt cat
description:
Bored of the existing games or looking for more fun and adventure? "Bboolt Cat" is an addictive game with over 60 challenging levels. Help the cute cat face the obstacles that come along the way and collect as many apples as you can to score the maximum points. The obstacles and challenges increase as you cross the levels. Each level is designed with awesome graphics and furious sound effects for more excitement and thrill. Play the game in various different challenging themes including desert, fire, water and various other landscapes.

The game "Bboolt Cat" is an amazing gameplay with intuitive touch mode controls. Run and jump to overcome the hurdles and complete the levels as fast as you can. Remember to collect the maximum apples to stay on top of the leaderboard. Be careful and stay focussed. The cute cat in the game has got lots of furious enemies to block the way. Use your gaming skills and thinking hat to stay away from the enemies and collect the apples under their nose. "Bboolt Cat" is a perfect game for players of all age groups. You'll have lots of fun playing the game.

Download the best thrilling game "Bboolt Cat" and enjoy unlimited fun helping the cute Bboolt Cat collect the apples. The game is perfect game to kill time especially when you are bored or even when you feel stressed out. The game is the best stress reliever and will help you relax your mind. Get the game and be the master by collecting the maximum apples.!.
